text: is a Japanese dancer and actor. He is one of the performers of the J-Pop group The Rampage from Exile Tribe. Iwaya is represented with LDH. == Career == In 2007, Iwaya started dancing in "Exile Live Tour 2007 Exile Evolution". He attended EXPG Osaka school. From 2011 to 2013, Iwaya was active as a support member of Generations. In March 2014, he auditioned for Exile Performer Battle Audition (to find a new performer for EXILE) but didn't make it to the finals. In April of the same year, he was announced as a candidate member of The Rampage, and in September he became an official member. In October 2016, he made his acting debut with High & Low The Movie. == Personal life == * Gekidan Exile's Kanta Sato was his classmate. == Filmography == === Movies === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Notes !Ref. |- |2016 |High & Low: The Movie | rowspan="3" |Ken | | |- | rowspan="2" |2017 |High & Low The Movie 2 / End Of Sky | | |- |High & Low THE Movie 3 / Final Mission | | |- |2019 |Cheer Boys!! |Gen Hasegawa | | |} === Dramas === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Network !Ref. |- | rowspan="2" |2019 |High & Low The Worst Episode.0 |Ken |NTV | |- |Kafka's Tokyo Despair Diary |Natsuo Akino |MBS | |} === Stage === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title |- | rowspan="2" |2017 |Hounangumi presents "Attack No. 1" |- |Hounangumi presents reading play "Aitakute..." |- |2018 |Hounangumi presents `THE mensetsu' |- |2019 |Hounangumi presents reading play "Aozora" |- |2020 |Reading drama Book Act "Mou ichido kimi to odoritai/ I want to dance with you again" |} === TV Shows === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Network !Notes !Ref. |- |2019 |"Gyutto Music" |KTV |MC alongside fellow member Shohei Urakawa | |} === Music videos === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Artist !Ref. |- |2008 |Gingatetsudou 999 |Exile | |- |2012 |Brave It Out | rowspan="5" |Generations from Exile Tribe | |- | rowspan="3" |2013 |Animal | |- |Love You More | |- |Hot Shot | |- |2016 |Ageha | |} == References == == External Links == * The Rampage Official Website Category:1997 births Category:Japanese male actors Category:Japanese male dancers Category:LDH (company) artists Category:Living people Category:People from Osaka Prefecture
